slides.title: GST Registration

# Registration Process

## Mandatory Registration

| Condition | Threshold |
|-----------|----------|
| Services | Rs 20 lakh |
| Goods | Rs 40 lakh |
| Interstate | Nil |

## GSTIN

```
15-digit number:
- 2 digits: State code
- 10 digits: PAN
- 1 digit: Entity
- 1 digit: Check
```

- Composition scheme

- Non-resident

slides.title: Cost Accounting Methods
slides.content:
# Costing Techniques

## Job Costing

```
Direct material + Direct labor + Applied overhead
= Job cost
```

## Process Costing

```
Equivalent units = Complete + (WIP x % complete)

Cost per EU = Total cost / Equivalent units
```

## Contract Costing

- Long-term contracts
- Progress payments
- Retention money

slides.title: Standard Costing
slides.content:
# Variance Analysis

## Material Variances

```
Price: (AP - SP) x AQ
Usage: (AQ - SQ) x SP
```

## Labor Variances

```
Rate: (AR - SR) x AH
Efficiency: (AH - SH) x SR
```

## Overhead Variances

| Variance | Formula |
|----------|--------|
| Spending | Actual - Budget |
| Efficiency | (AH - SH) x Rate |
| Volume | (Budgeted - Actual) x Rate |

slides.title: Marginal Costing
slides.content:
# Variable Costing

## Contribution

```
Sales - Variable Costs = Contribution

Contribution - Fixed Costs = Profit
```

## Break-Even

```
BEP (units) = Fixed Costs / Contribution per unit

BEP (value) = Fixed Costs / P/V Ratio
```

## P/V Ratio

```
P/V Ratio = Contribution / Sales x 100
```

## Margin of Safety

```
Actual Sales - BEP Sales
```
